title: I'll go again
creator_credit: Paul Cowan, Michael McKennirey, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: I’ll Go Again is a film about four athletes and a team that competed in the 1976 Montreal Olympics. They had trained courageously to be among those who would mount the podium to receive a medal. None did. Was it worth it? The film answers the question. (Awards: Budapest; Yorkton)
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Cowan, Michael McKennirey, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
